1.base:
Data can be in xml/json/yaml/csv format.

There is also an own PAD list format with opening ( and closing )

0.base:
{block} With the &open;data&close; tag it is possible to define data for later use. {/block} {get 'data/1'}
{block} Data can be in xml/jso
